verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Growing together as the family of God and celebrating our Christian heritage with joy and love in one true faith.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1. You call us Lord to receive the Good News that make us one as a family of God X2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 2. You call us Lord to receive the Sacrament that make us one as a family of God X2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 3. You call us Lord to live in love that make us one as a family of God X2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 4. You call us Lord to live in truth that make us one as a family of God X2

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 5. You call us Lord to live in you that make us one as a family of God X2
